Appproaching. 5-10 km.
At the coast.
At the coast.
Explosions in Sanzhiika, Odesa Oblast.
1 of the glide-bombs was shot down around 15 km from the coast. The other impacted.
The missile which shot it down. Likely an IRIS-T.
At least six Russian Geran-2 drones are now flying to attack the same target near Sanzhiika, Odesa Oblast.
At least six Russian Geran-2 drones are now flying to attack the same target near Sanzhiika, Odesa Oblast.
Correction: they are flying further north and attacking the Velykodolyns'ke area, near Odesa City.

Over the last few days, the Ukrainian defence of Hulyaipole has begun to collapse. As a result, Russian forces now control more than 55% of the city.
This is occurring mainly due to superior Russian manpower and firepower, a complete lack of coordination between Ukrainian units, and the heavy losses suffered by Ukraine during the Russian advances and encirclements east of Hulyaipole.
KABs to Zaporizhzhia. 5 km away.

Explosion in Zaporizhzhia. Impacting the outskirts. 
3 other KABs impacted the outskirts/southern suburbs around 10 minutes ago.
Repeated launches were carried out by Su-34s at high altitudes.
Explosion in Zaporizhzhia. Impacting the outskirts.   3 other KABs impacted the outskirts/southern suburbs around 10 minutes ago.  Repeated launches were carried out by Su-34s at high altitudes.

These new ones are 25 km away from the city, over Kamyanske. 
Even more launches were carried out.
Scenes from Zaporizhzhia City. A large attack is underway.
These new ones are 25 km away from the city, over Kamyanske.   Even more launches were carried out.

KABs are 5 km from Zaporizhzhia City.
More KABs are flying to the western suburbs.
Repeated launch maneuvers were carried out by Su-34s.
Explosion in Zaporizhzhia. Impacting the outskirts again.

More from Zaporizhzhia. 
This is in the Pivdenny District in the southern part of the city.

The last group of KABs is flying over Plavni/Stepnohirsk, 20 km from Zaporizhzhia City.
Additionally, at least 8 Geran-2 drones are flying in a chain format in the direction of the city.
The last group of KABs is flying over Plavni/Stepnohirsk, 20 km from Zaporizhzhia City.  Additionally, at least 8 Geran-2 drones are flying in a chain format in the direction of the city.

3-4 more explosions, impacting the Kushuhum area, south of the city.
Currently all clear for glide-bombs
8-9 FAB-500s were used in total, launched by 4-5 Su-34s at their launch lines northwest of Tokmak, Zaporizhzhia Oblast.

Footage showing Ukrainian volunteers evacuating civilians from Kostyantynivka, Donetsk Oblast, under Russian FPV drone and artillery fire.
Video is from November 19, 2025
Credit
More from Zaporizhzhia.   This is in the Pivdenny District in the southern part of the city.

Two geolocations show that one of the Russian glide-bombs impacted a high-rise residential building in the Pivdenni District of Zaporizhzhia City.
Coordinates: 47.7748, 35.17731
Two geolocations show that one of the Russian glide-bombs impacted a high-rise residential building in the Pivdenni District of Zaporizhzhia City.  Coordinates: 47.7748, 35.17731

What's odd is that the damage here does not match that expected from a 250 or 500-kilogram bomb. 
Previously, I thought that it impacted right at the base or in front of the building (red square), but footage posted by the OVA shows that there is no crater. Only minor damage to the front of the building can be seen (yellow square).
It's possible that the glide-bomb was shot down over the southern suburbs of the city, although this is a very rare occurrence. 
At least 21 civilians were injured in the attack - no deaths have been reported yet.

A Battle With ISIS Is Brewing In Former Stronghold Of Syrian President 
A battle with ISIS seems to be brewing in the northern Syrian governorate of Idlib, the former stronghold of Hay‚Äôat Tahrir al-Sham (HTS) which carried out, under the command of the current President Ahmad al-Sharaa, the lightning offensive that took down the regime of former President Bashar al-Assad last year.
Sharaa himself was a lieutenant of ISIS founder Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. When the war first broke out, al-Baghdadi sent Sharaa, known by his nom de guerre ‚ÄúAbu Mohamad al-Julani‚Äù, to Syria to found the Nusra Front.
The Syrian Interior Ministry announced on December 16 that security forces arrested members of an ISIS cell believed to be responsible for recent attacks that targeted military and security personnel in Idlib and the nearby governorate of Aleppo.
Just two days earlier, four security personnel were killed while on patrol near the town of Maaret Al Numan in Idlib in an attack later claimed by ISIS.
Read more 
HERE

Hezbollah Is Hiding Its Assets, Could Attack Israel With Hundreds Of Rockets And Drone In Next War
Hezbollah is attempting to conceal most of its strategic assets in tunnels and bunkers beneath residential buildings in the Shiite-majority suburb of southern Beirut and could launch hundreds of rockets, guided missiles and suicide drones against Israel in case of a new war, Ynet reported on December 16, citing Israeli defense and intelligence officials.
According to the report, Hezbollah was "weakened" by the last confrontation with the Israeli military but is still "well-armed".
Defense officials told Yent that they believe that no operation will proceed without the consent of U.S. President Donald Trump, making it unlikely that any action would be taken before Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu‚Äôs scheduled visit to the White House later this month.
Read more 
HERE

Ukraine Can‚Äôt Stop Russian Advance Along Haichur, Or In Huliapole (Videos)
On December 17, the Russian expanded its control in Dnepropetrovsk along the Haichur River by capturing another settlement, all while battling Kiev forces inside the key city of Huliapole to the south in Zaporozhye.
Gerasimovka, located on the left bank of the Haichur, was captured by the Vostok [East] Group of Forces, according to the Russian Ministry of Defense, which said in a statement that the attack on the settlement was led by the 36th Guards Motorised Rifle Brigade of the 29th Army.
In addition to the ongoing operations along the Haichur, the Vostok Group of Forces continue to expand its control in Huliapole.
Read more 
HERE
